doc.after: In 2013 Sierra Leone has an officially projected population of 6,190,280[1] and a growth rate of 2.216% a year.[55] The country's population is mostly young, with an estimated 41.7% under 15, and rural, with an estimated 62% of people living outside the cities.[55] As a result of migration to cities, the population is becoming more urban with an estimated rate of urbanisation growth of 2.9% a year.[55][102]
